episodes.name: Blood Brothers
episodes.overview: Detectives in major cities around the country race against the clock to solve homicides and use forensic evidence and witness interviews to help identify suspects.

episodes.name: Circle of Friends & Rearview Murder
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, detectives follow a trail of blood to a community where one person's accusations have deadly consequences.  In Mobile, a possible collision between two strangers escalates into a deadly shooting.

episodes.name: Murder in the Bud Room & A Mother Taken
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a heated argument spirals out of control, ending in the shocking murder of a father of six.  In Gwinnett County, a young boy is the only witness to the violent abduction of his mother, leaving detectives racing to find her . . . before it's too late.

episodes.name: Unfriendly Fire
episodes.overview: A college student is gunned down in a doorway; Tulsa Homicide detectives explore whether a feud between friends escalated to murder.

episodes.name: The Mother I Wish I Knew
episodes.overview: Rhianna Stephens is convinced her father is innocent of the 1988 murder of her mother, Deborah Atrops.

episodes.name: Secrets in the Ashes
episodes.overview: A house fire in South Texas kills Patricia Leigh Mills while her young son miraculously escapes.

episodes.name: Her Last Note
episodes.overview: A teen musician is murdered in her home, another young woman is brutally attacked nearby and the link that helped police catch the killer.

episodes.name: The Cool Mum
episodes.overview: After a North Charleston mother of four is found beaten to death in the bushes, a rookie detective battles it out in the interview room with her suspected killer.

episodes.name: Melissa Rocuba's Final Moments
episodes.overview: A woman dies after an "accidental" shooting in her bedroom. Eight years later, surveillance video upends the case.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Sarah
episodes.overview: Sarah Hartsfield's husband Joseph died in 2023 after being hospitalized in critical condition for hypoglycemia—a dangerous drop in blood sugar. Investigators would soon find a web of suspicious deaths in Sarah's past.

episodes.name: The Hunt for Mr. Right
episodes.overview: From Mr. Right to most wanted: Investigators uncover the double life of an international fugitive.

episodes.name: A Lonely Place to Die
episodes.overview: When a father of six is found shot in an urban encampment, Tulsa Homicide calls on the unhoused community to help them find the killer.

episodes.name: The Gaslighting of Hannah Pettey
episodes.overview: When a young woman nearly dies from poisoning, investigators focus on the two people she trusted most.

episodes.name: Badass Detective
episodes.overview: A dogged detective will stop at nothing -- donning disguises, going under cover, and employing cutting edge forensics -- all to solve the murders of two young women

episodes.name: Betrayal
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, the murder of two women sends detectives on a desperate search for a missing third who may also be a victim of homicide.

episodes.name: Heather Hoffman
episodes.overview: When a young father is murdered in his apartment, investigators learn the victim was involved in a bitter custody battle prior to his death.

episodes.name: Coached to Kill
episodes.overview: Did a high school softball coach recruit one of her former players to kill?

episodes.name: Meddler or Murderer?
episodes.overview: A wealthy grandmother goes on trial accused in the murder-for-hire of a family member.

episodes.name: Four Shots
episodes.overview: In North Charleston, a construction worker is killed by a stray bullet during an attempted robbery inside a trailer park; as investigators follow the suspects' trail, they discover things are not what they seem.

episodes.name: Ride or Die
episodes.overview: After a 24-year-old mother is brutally shot and killed outside her workplace, real-time surveillance video helps detectives uncover clues that lead to a suspect whose own confession suggests a possible mastermind still at large.

episodes.name: Joe Hunter's Mission
episodes.overview: "Survivor" contestant Joe Hunter Jr. believes his sister Joanna was murdered in 2011, and he is determined to be her voice.

episodes.name: The Farmer's Wife
episodes.overview: After a 911 call reporting a home invasion, police discover Karina Cooper sitting on her husband Ryan's blood-covered body in their Traer, Iowa, farmhouse. In the aftermath of Ryan Cooper's murder, rumors sweep through the small town, but investigators must uncover whether the talk is gossip or a crucial clue.

episodes.name: Help Find Molly Bish's Killer
episodes.overview: With her sister's murder long unsolved, a woman turns to TikTok pleading for leads. Can you help?

episodes.name: The Ruse
episodes.overview: When a California father fails to return home after a quick trip to check his mail, his son calls police for help -- only to find himself the focus of their investigation until a stunning revelation upends the case.

episodes.name: Raising the Dead
episodes.overview: In rural Wisconsin, a woman and her boyfriend are found stabbed to death inside her farmhouse. Thirty years later, the daughter of one of the original suspects comes forward, reigniting the case all the way to trial.

episodes.name: The Final Cut
episodes.overview: A beloved hairstylist vanishes without a trace, launching a multistate investigation that ultimately uncovers a chilling trail of deception.

episodes.name: The Setup Murder of Kristil Krug
episodes.overview: A stalker sends menacing messages to a young mother before she is murdered. The investigation reveals a sinister setup.

episodes.name: Running Man
episodes.overview: Investigators discover a car engulfed in flames in a remote wooded area near the Blue Mountains. When first responders pull the body of a local mother from the wreckage, the question arises: was the crash an accident, or something far more sinister?

episodes.name: I'm Going to Get You
episodes.overview: A college student is murdered in her home, and while investigators work the case, evidence from a string of sexual assaults leads to a break; a survivor who helped authorities catch the killer speaks out for the first time;

episodes.name: Tracker Dakota Black
episodes.overview: A detective hunts for answers when a woman goes missing. For Tracker Black it's personal. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

episodes.name: The Trouble in Bardstown
episodes.overview: The disappearance of a mother of five sends shockwaves through the picturesque town of Bardstown, Kentucky, which witnesses five murders in four years. Frustrated with stalled progress, her family takes the investigation into their own hands.

episodes.name: You Took My Daughter
episodes.overview: At Fort Bragg, North Carolina, 24-year-old mother and Army maternity ward nurse Holly Wimunc suddenly vanished in July 2008. At her apartment, coworkers reportedly found smoke damage and signs of an intentionally set fire. While detectives scrambled to find her, her father, halfway across the country, was just learning his girl was gone.

episodes.name: The Han Family Murders
episodes.overview: A beloved doctor, his wife, and their young daughter are murdered, leaving their Santa Barbara, California, community reeling. A suspect emerges with a fantastical story of shadowy figures and intrigue straight out of a spy thriller.

episodes.name: The Death of Dr. Schwartz
episodes.overview: Steven Schwartz, a prominent kidney specialist, was found brutally murdered on May 28, 2014, in his waterfront home in Tarpon Springs, FL. At first glance, the scene looked like a botched burglary, but investigators would eventually uncover a decades-old secret that led to a violent killing.

episodes.name: The Murdaugh Family Murders
episodes.overview: The Murdaugh family once held deep roots in South Carolina’s Lowcountry, where generations served as top prosecutors and wielded influence across legal and political circles. But behind the prestige was a web of corruption, financial crimes, and ultimately, murder.

episodes.name: Closing the Cold Case of Robin Lawrence
episodes.overview: Robin Lawrence was home alone with her 2-year-old daughter in Springfield, VA, when an unknown killer murdered her. Her toddler was left to fend for herself for two days until Robin’s body was discovered. Nearly 30 years later, cold case detectives uncovered a surprising suspect. "48 Hours" correspondent Anne-Marie Green reports.

episodes.name: Deadly Mischief
episodes.overview: On the morning of July 18, 2014, esteemed Florida State University law professor Dan Markel was ambushed and shot twice in the head in his Tallahassee driveway. What began as a targeted assassination in a quiet Tallahassee neighborhood would eventually expose a web of lies, manipulation, and greed within a wealthy South Florida family.

episodes.name: Lost in the Night: Who Murdered Jessica Currin?
episodes.overview: In Mayfield, Kentucky, 18-year-old single mother Jessica Currin was brutally murdered in 2000. The case haunted the town for years until a jury convicted Quincy Omar Cross in 2008. What began as a local tragedy has become a national conversation about truth, power, and accountability as Cross's claim of a wrong conviction gains momentum.

episodes.name: Jessica Quintanilla
episodes.overview: A promising college student disappears after a Halloween party.

episodes.name: My Uncle Joe's Murder
episodes.overview: Joe Shymanski was gunned down in the driveway of his Calvert County, MD, home in 2023. Now his niece mourns her uncle's murder and questions whether the convicted killer was the only one involved. "48 Hours" contributor Nikki Battiste reports.

episodes.name: A Perfect Spring Morning
episodes.overview: The quiet community of Chevy Chase, MD, is shaken when mother Leslie Preer is found murdered in her shower. Detectives find plausible suspects quickly, but without evidence the case goes cold until a surprising lead unmasks the killer two decades later.

episodes.name: Driven to Death
episodes.overview: In Horry County, South Carolina, Gregory Rice's disappearance in early October 2020 sparked a search that eventually uncovered a secret affair.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #20
episodes.overview: In Kansas City, Kansas, when a dead body is discovered in a bridge, catching the killer depends on finding the crime scene.

episodes.name: Gina Spann
episodes.overview: A respected soldier and beloved family man is found shot to death inside his home.

episodes.name: A Death in the Stairwell
episodes.overview: After her husband, Kevin Davis, is found dying at the foot of the stairs, a woman accused of murder fights to clear her name. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

episodes.name: The Prince, The Whiz Kid & The Millionaire
episodes.overview: When 74-year-old Clifford Lambert goes missing in California, the case eventually reveals a sophisticated web of deception, forged documents, and greed-fueled betrayal—resulting in multiple convictions, one inmate’s death, and a decade-long legal saga that only recently concluded.

episodes.name: Life on the Line
episodes.overview: 21-year-old mother Denise Amber Lee disappears from her North Port, Florida, home. Follow the real 911 calls as they unravel in this life-and-death case.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #19
episodes.overview: A strange series of coincidences elude Tulsa homicide, when two bruised-up homeless men are picked up near a crime scene.

episodes.name: Murder in the Parking Garage
episodes.overview: For years, Kenneth Fandrich told everyone he knew that he was being stalked by the nicest man in town. In 2023, after his wife calls 911 to report her husband missing, police discover his lifeless body in his car, parked inside a corporate parking garage. "48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

episodes.name: The Bucket Hat Mystery
episodes.overview: Paradise turns deadly in Oahu, HI, when Jon Tokuhara, an acupuncturist and surfer with no known enemies, is shot dead in his clinic. Investigators uncover the victim's tangled love life, pointing to several persons of interest - until surveillance video reveals a new and unexpected suspect.

episodes.name: What Happened to the McStays?
episodes.overview: In 2010, Joseph and Summer McStay and their two young sons vanished from their Fallbrook, California, home. For nearly four years, the family’s fate remained unknown—until a grim discovery in the Mojave Desert turned the missing persons case into a homicide investigation.

episodes.name: Marique Ruth
episodes.overview: Iowa investigators respond to a man's fatal shooting. His girlfriend claims it was self-defense.

episodes.name: The Boy Who Killed His Twin
episodes.overview: Seventeen-year-old Benjamin Elliott fatally stabs his twin sister, Meghan, in the middle of the night – a crime with no known motive and an act his defense claims he committed while sleepwalking. "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

episodes.name: Coached To Kill
episodes.overview: A preview of the case of a high school softball coach accused of recruiting a former player to kill her ex-boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Phantom
episodes.overview: The murder of a Colorado mother seems to point to an obvious suspect, but as investigators dig deeper, they uncover and elaborate plot filled with secrets and deception that turns the entire case upside down.

episodes.name: He's Right Behind You
episodes.overview: Who would want to kill Kristil Krug, a mom of three kids? Follow the clues in a race against time to catch a deadly stalker.

episodes.name: Sherry Hefernan
episodes.overview: A seaside home becomes the scene of a gruesome double homicide.

episodes.name: The Betrayal of Sandra Birchmore
episodes.overview: A February nor'easter closes a Boston-area elementary school; when it reopens, 23-year-old teacher’s aide Sandra Birch more never returns and is found dead in her home days later. Investigators rule the death a suicide, but was it something far more sinister?

episodes.name: 21 Days To Murder
episodes.overview: Exclusive interviews and new evidence in the shocking case of a Colorado dentist accused of murdering his wife by poisoning her protein shakes.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #18
episodes.overview: When surveillance footage shows a man carrying a box moments before he is shot, Detective Tracy Casey must determine if the box's contents holds the key to determining motive.

episodes.name: Nistasha Tate
episodes.overview: A waterfront mansion becomes the scene of a grisly murder.

episodes.name: The Night of the Audition
episodes.overview: After newlywed Shannon Madill Burgess does not show up for a family gathering after landing a big audition, her loved ones begin to worry, and authorities uncover unsettling details.

episodes.name: First Comes Love, Then Comes Murder
episodes.overview: When a wife and mother named Leslie Preer was killed in her house in Chevy Chase, Maryland, in the spring of 2001, shockwaves were sent across the entire community. Her loved ones had to wait for justice for more than two decades until the detectives apprehended the killer using an advanced DNA technology. The investigation revealed a dark truth that connected the killer to the Preer family.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #17
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, a 17-year old high school student is shot over a gaming controller on his way to school and a star witness identifies her boyfriend's killers.

episodes.name: Leah Cuevas
episodes.overview: When body parts start turning up across New York, panic sets in over the possible return of a known serial killer. As detectives connect the dots, they uncover a simmering dispute that exploded into a crime far more disturbing than anyone imagined.

episodes.name: Secrets of Exam Room 9
episodes.overview: When Angela Craig, a healthy mother of six, dies suddenly after an apparent medical illness, her community is stunned. As investigators dig deeper, suspicion shifts to her husband James, a respected local dentist and member of the LDS church.

episodes.name: Idaho Justice
episodes.overview: This episode delves into the high-profile case of the University of Idaho murders. It uncovers new details about the crime, the evidence collected, and the shocking guilty plea entered by the accused, Bryan Kohberger. The episode includes exclusive interviews with the families and friends of the victims.

episodes.name: Deadly Connection
episodes.overview: When a young father is found shot and killed in the parking lot of an apartment complex, Tulsa Homicide discovers he may have been lured there under false pretenses.

episodes.name: Kimberly Reps
episodes.overview: When a newlywed couple is shot in their North Carolina home, leaving the husband dead, investigators must determine if it's a robbery gone wrong or something more sinister and as the evidence piles up, it reveals a jealous lover hiding in plain sight.

episodes.name: Ashley Benefield
episodes.overview: A former ballerina fatally shoots her estranged husband.

episodes.name: Ashley Nicole Haydt
episodes.overview: When a beloved father narrowly survives a car bombing, a manhunt is launched to find who set the trap.

episodes.name: Deborah Mosby
episodes.overview: A woman's death is initially ruled a suicide, but a shocking conspiracy is revealed.

episodes.name: The Man in the Mask
episodes.overview: When a beloved soccer fan is shot dead in broad daylight, Gwinnett County detectives race to find his mysterious killer before he strikes again.

episodes.name: One Night in Mobile
episodes.overview: When a mother goes missing on New Year's Day, a couple must explain why they are in possession of her property.

episodes.name: Ulisa Chavers
episodes.overview: A Virginia father is reported missing two years after he was last seen. As the investigation ensues to track down his last location, a disturbing discovery will expose two mysterious deaths tied to a greedy scheme.

episodes.name: The Wrong Girl
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, when a man is gunned down at an apartment complex, detectives run up against elusive witnesses and dead ends in their search to figure out who wanted him dead.

episodes.name: Ina Kenoyer
episodes.overview: A North Dakota man dies in the hospital from an apparent heatstroke. When the coroner discovers the cause of death was poisoning, authorities launch a criminal investigation that leads them to a calculating killer with a multi-million-dollar motive.

episodes.name: Sean Combs: The Insiders Speak
episodes.overview: New interviews and exclusive details following the Sean "Diddy" Combs trial.

episodes.name: Cassidy's Keys
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, when a woman goes missing after an argument with her new husband, detectives peel back the layers of her relationship to find their suspect.

episodes.name: Angelita Wright
episodes.overview: A local musician is killed in a deliberate hit and run, in a small South Carolina town.

episodes.name: Connie Pfieffer
episodes.overview: A noise complaint turns into a murder investigation for Florida police.

episodes.name: Broken Youth
episodes.overview: When a popular young man is executed in broad daylight, Tulsa Homicide struggles to understand why one teen would kill another in cold blood.

episodes.name: They Know Everything
episodes.overview: A killer puts a complex scheme into play after murdering University of Florida freshman Christian Aguilar. A new investigation unearths the lengths taken to bury the truth.

episodes.name: Center of the Storm
episodes.overview: Andrea Canning reports on the verdict in the retrial of Karen Read in Dedham, Massachusetts.

episodes.name: Death Comes Knocking
episodes.overview: When a young father is shot to death inside his home, Det. Mark Kennedy must figure out if an argument earlier that day escalated to homicide.

episodes.name: Karen Read: The Verdict
episodes.overview: The girlfriend of a beloved Boston police officer learns her fate in the murder case that captivated the country across two high-profile trials.

episodes.name: Shawnie Vel Young
episodes.overview: After the body of a small-town Mississippi woman is found, police must work to identify a romantic rival obsessed with getting rid of the competition.

episodes.name: Friends No More
episodes.overview: A man is found lying outside his family home with a bullet in his head, and Tulsa homicide must find a way to make the killer reveal himself.

episodes.name: Kathleen Witte
episodes.overview: When a man is found dead at a secluded rest stop, Ohio police suspect foul play within his family. As evidence builds, tensions rise, and reveal the work of a criminal mastermind intent on manipulating everyone around them.

episodes.name: I Have Killed For You
episodes.overview: Bonnie Woodward, a beloved 47-year-old mother of four, goes missing from her workplace parking lot in Alton, Illinois, in 2010, while her teenage stepdaughter is also missing.

episodes.name: Sierra Jane Inscoe
episodes.overview: A beloved son is reported missing after he fails to return home from a date. Various Mississippi agencies unite to navigate his last moments and a false lead that will expose a cold-blooded scheme.

episodes.name: My Mother's Murder Trials (2)
episodes.overview: A daughter suspects her mother of a double murder. Years later, courtroom drama brings unsettling answers.

episodes.name: Road Map to Murder
episodes.overview: Bart and Krista Halderson, a married couple in Windsor, Wisconsin, go missing in 2021. After their remains are found, a clue from social media changes the entire course of the murder investigation.

episodes.name: Amy Reese
episodes.overview: A man’s body is discovered in his Texas home, hidden for weeks after his murder. When police discover that his family is missing as well, the investigation reveals a desperate escape attempt and a motive rooted in fear and betrayal.

episodes.name: My Mother's Murder Trials (1)
episodes.overview: Dana Chandler's own daughter believes she committed a double murder. Years later, courtroom drama brings unsettling answers.

episodes.name: Sherri Papini: Where the Truth Lies
episodes.overview: Sherri Papini, the woman who captivated the country by faking her own abduction, speaks out in a new documentary for the first time.

episodes.name: The Footprint
episodes.overview: Jeanie Ann Childs is murdered in her home in south Minneapolis and the pivotal clue at the crime is a bloody footprint her killer left behind.

episodes.name: Blood on the Door
episodes.overview: 21-year-old Johnia Berry was pursuing a master's degree in psychology at the University of Tennessee when an intruder entered her apartment, stabbing her and leaving her to die. For years, the case went cold, but Johnia's mother kept fighting for justice.

episodes.name: Sean Combs on Trial
episodes.overview: Correspondent Josh Mankiewicz reports on the charges against Combs, which include a five-count federal indictment for racketeering and sex trafficking.

episodes.name: Facing a Monster
episodes.overview: As a teenager, C.C. Opanowski survives a vicious attack by an ex-boyfriend. Years later, she faces him in court after he murders a young mother.

episodes.name: The Terrible Night on King Road
episodes.overview: In the early morning hours of November 13, 2022, four University of Idaho students were killed in an off-campus rental house on King Road in Moscow, Idaho. See never-before-reported evidence, including video, photographic, and digital materials that investigators say track accused killer Bryan Kohberger’s movements.

episodes.name: Secrets of the Sliding Door
episodes.overview: Simeonette Mapes-Crupi, a beloved Staten Island teacher, is found dead in the home she shared with her husband.

episodes.name: The Boy Across the Street
episodes.overview: College student Catina Rose Salarno is killed by her boyfriend who lived right across the street. Decades later, her family is still battling to keep him in prison.

episodes.name: Murder in Minot
episodes.overview: College student Anita Knutson is found stabbed to death. The case took years and the unwavering commitment of loved ones and investigators to reach a resolution.

episodes.name: The Rose Petal Murder
episodes.overview: When Christina Parcell's body was discovered in her South Carolina home in October 2021, the gruesome crime scene also featured a strange clue—mysterious rose petals scattered around the house. Later, another unexpected clue leads to a courtroom confession that no one saw coming.

episodes.name: The Farris Wheel
episodes.overview: Melody Farris, the matriarch of a wealthy family, spins a tale trying to pin the murder of her husband on her own son.

episodes.name: The Devil’s in the Details
episodes.overview: A West Virginia pharmacist is left widowed after her husband, 38-year-old Michael Cochran, suddenly dies. Their close-knit neighborhood rallies around the family until troubling details emerge regarding the couple's new business venture.

episodes.name: First Love, Then Murder
episodes.overview: When Oregon teen Ellen Friar disappears, investigators discover her forbidden relationship led to murder. "48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

episodes.name: Unlucky Numbers
episodes.overview: When Abraham Shakespeare wins $30 million in the Florida lottery in 2006, he is generous with his winnings, helping friends, family, and strangers. But three years after his windfall, Shakespeare mysteriously vanishes. Police begin an investigation, and there is no shortage of possible suspects.

episodes.name: The Pin at Apartment 210
episodes.overview: 22-year-old Jasmine "Jazzy" Pace, a young Tennessee woman, mysteriously vanishes and misses her family's Thanksgiving dinner. Determined to track her down, her family takes matters into their own hands, pursuing every digital clue she left behind. What begins as a missing persons report evolves into a disturbing and calculated murder investigation.

episodes.name: The Day My Mother Never Came Home
episodes.overview: Did a father use his 6-year-old son as an alibi for murder? Reggie Reed Jr. grapples with his parents' troubled past.

episodes.name: The Widow of Woodland Hills
episodes.overview: Celebrity hairdresser Fabio Sementilli is brutally murdered in his backyard. A security camera helps investigators identify unlikely suspects and an illicit affair.

episodes.name: Sex, Knives, and Videotape
episodes.overview: A beloved celebrity hairstylist is found murdered in his own home in 2017. Was it a burglary gone wrong or something more sinister? His family searches for justice and answers. Who killed Fabio?

episodes.name: The Last Mile
episodes.overview: On July 18, 2018, Mollie Tibbetts, a 20-year-old University of Iowa student, disappears while jogging near her home in Brooklyn, Iowa. Investigators discover security camera video that reveals a critical clue.

episodes.name: Deadly Obsession
episodes.overview: Mike Sisco and his fiancé Karen Harkness are found shot to death in their Topeka duplex in 2002. A years-long search for the killer and three criminal trials over two decades reveals strained dynamics within one victim’s family.

episodes.name: Family Lies?
episodes.overview: Newly obtained investigative files provide fresh insight into one of New England's most notorious mysteries, which unfolded after Nathan Carman and his mother Linda Carman took a fateful fishing trip in 2016. Was it lost at sea...or was it murder?

episodes.name: A Killer Among Us
episodes.overview:
Season Finale

In Tulsa, when a woman goes missing after an argument with her new husband, detectives peel back the layers of her relationship to find their suspect.

episodes.name: Dead Girls Don't Talk
episodes.overview: A man charged with murder for poisoning two women tells a friend, "dead girls don't talk." Brave survivors speak out on their behalf.

episodes.name: Armed to Party
episodes.overview: A young man who came to the U.S. to fulfill his dreams is killed at a birthday party, and Tulsa police must cut through a web of lies to find the culprit.

episodes.name: Poison Twist
episodes.overview: Kaitlyn Conley was convicted of manslaughter in 2017 after the death of Mary Yoder by poison. Conley maintains she is innocent and continues her fight to overturn the conviction.

episodes.name: Dirty Little Secret
episodes.overview: The death of Kari Baker, a Texas minister's wife, left a church community shocked and her family convinced it was foul play.

episodes.name: It's Not Over
episodes.overview: An altercation in a casino parking lot leads to murder when friends abandon reason for revenge.

episodes.name: Could Angela Prichard Have Been Saved?
episodes.overview: A woman repeatedly called police for help when she was attacked, stalked, and intimidated by her husband. It didn't stop him from killing her. "48 Hours" contributor Jonathan Vigliotti reports.

episodes.name: Deadly Entanglement
episodes.overview: In 2013, Desiree Sunford is found murdered in her Yakima, Washington, home. The case, which begins with what seems to be a simple burglary, spirals into a complex investigation exposing a tangled web of betrayal, deception, and fatal obsession.

episodes.name: You Left Me For Dead
episodes.overview: Two women shot while asleep in their home – one miraculously survives to tell her story.

episodes.name: Denise Gay
episodes.overview: An aspiring young artist from Virginia is reported missing by his family. When his body is found weeks later, investigators must delve into his tumultuous family life and uncover an eyewitness who reveals the lies and deceit that led to his murder.

episodes.name: Cati Blauvelt: Death of a Soldier's Wife
episodes.overview: Shortly after former Army recruiter John Blauvelt was questioned about the fatal stabbing of his estranged wife Cati Blauvelt in South Carolina, he went on the run with his then-17-year-old girlfriend, Hannah Thompson. What does she know?

episodes.name: Lori Vallow Daybell: The Jailhouse Interview
episodes.overview: Lori and Chad Daybell were both convicted in separate trials for the gruesome killings of two of Lori’s children in 2019. Now, Lori breaks her silence in a shocking new interview from prison.

episodes.name: The Code Breakers
episodes.overview: David Muir investigates how cutting-edge forensic DNA technology has led to long-awaited justice in two murder cases that remained unsolved for decades.

episodes.name: The Hit-and-Run Homicide of Davis McClendon
episodes.overview: When South Carolina authorities found Davis McClendon dead by the road near his wrecked car, they suspected a hit-and-run. But his newfound love is convinced it was not accident.

episodes.name: The Haunted House Confession
episodes.overview: On Friday the 13th, 25-year-old Chantay Blankinship doesn't come home from her usual walk around the neighborhood. Two days later, searchers make a gruesome discovery at an abandoned farmhouse that locals call the Haunted House. When all leads dry up, investigators turn to a unique forensic DNA tool, which sparks a shocking confession during a church service.

episodes.name: Mountain of Lies
episodes.overview: A mother plunges from a cliff in a fatal fall while hiking in the Rocky Mountains on her anniversary. For the first time, her daughter speaks out.

episodes.name: A Walk Through the Woods
episodes.overview: The high-profile case of two murdered Indiana teens takes a stunning turn after video of the killer, taken by one of his victims shortly before their deaths, is revealed.

episodes.name: Gabby Petito: Her Parents Speak Out
episodes.overview: A new interview with Gabby Petito's parents reveals what we haven't heard before about the case.

episodes.name: Home Ground / In the Shadows
episodes.overview: When a man is found shot at a neighborhood party, detectives discover his friends may be hiding a secret.  A father is gunned down in front of his girlfriend when a relationship from the past comes back to haunt them.

episodes.name: Home Ground and In the Shadows
episodes.overview: When a man is found shot at a neighborhood party, detectives discover his friends may be hiding a secret. A father is gunned down in front of his girlfriend when a relationship from the past comes back to haunt them.

episodes.name: Tashia Stuart
episodes.overview: After a 911 hang-up, Pasco, Wash., police report to the caller’s address and discover a beloved grandmother has been fatally shot. Detectives will combat self-defense claims as evidence of a greedy scheme comes to light.

episodes.name: Justine's Voice
episodes.overview: After a teenager is strangled and buried alive, her family takes on the fight to keep her convicted killers behind bars. "We're her voice" says Justine's sister. "48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

episodes.name: Return to the Lake
episodes.overview: 30 years later... On October 25, 1994, Susan Smith reported that her two young sons had been taken by a carjacker. Everyone was looking for the two young brothers. For nine days, hearts went out to their poor parents. What came next was unimaginable.

episodes.name: Small Town, Big Con
episodes.overview: The investigation into a multimillion-dollar con in a close-knit community helps investigators uncover the murder of a young father.

episodes.name: Silent Parties
episodes.overview: When a young man is killed at a party in a Gwinnett County park, detectives must turn to the families of the victim and possible suspect to break the silence.

episodes.name: Silent Parties
episodes.overview: When a young man is killed at a party in a Gwinnett County park, detectives must turn to the families of the victim and possible suspect to break the silence.

episodes.name: It's About Danni
episodes.overview: When 15-year-old Danni Houchins is found dead in a swamp, her family says they were led to believe she drowned. 24 years later, Danni's sister learns the terrible truth. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

episodes.name: Under the Bay Bridge
episodes.overview: Bob Lee was a well-known tech visionary whose sudden and brutal death in 2023 left the tech world in shock. Family, friends, attorneys, police, and colleagues from the tech industry speak out exclusively to Dateline’s Josh Mankiewicz about the case.

episodes.name: File M for Murder
episodes.overview: When an insurance agent is murdered in his office, evidence points to a secret relationship, until new DNA technology helps authorities find the real killer.

episodes.name: Chain Reaction
episodes.overview: A young father loses his life when tempers flare and bullets fly at a Gwinnett County nightclub.

episodes.name: Chain Reaction
episodes.overview: A young father loses his life when tempers flare and bullets fly at a nightclub in Gwinnett County.

episodes.name: Angela Sanford
episodes.overview: When a woman survives an alleged assault in the New Mexico desert and her purported attacker is found stabbed to death, investigators must get to the bottom of a bizarre murder plot driven by one suspect’s obsession with the occult.

episodes.name: The No Body Case of Dee Warner
episodes.overview: When a woman disappears, her children are certain she's been murdered. But without a body, they know it will be hard to get justice. "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

episodes.name: The Devil Wore White
episodes.overview: An elderly socialite is reported missing from her stately New York City brownstone. When Sante Kimes and her son Kenny are arrested, an investigation reveals decades of crime, deception, and murder that captivated the nation.

episodes.name: Run, Run, Run
episodes.overview: A loving husband is found murdered in his home. Weeks later, his wife receives a chilling death threat on her doorstep. Investigators are left to unravel a web of dark secrets dating back decades.

episodes.name: Minibike Murder
episodes.overview: After a mysterious motorcycle rider stalks and shoots down a Tulsa man, detectives must piece together the events leading up to his death to find out who wanted him dead and why.

episodes.name: Minibike Murder
episodes.overview: After a mysterious motorcycle rider stalks and shoots down a Tulsa man, detectives must piece together the events leading up to his death to find out who wanted him dead and why.

episodes.name: Donna Horwitz
episodes.overview: After a father is found dead in his family's Florida mansion, what at first appears to be suicide turns into a complex murder mystery where a mother's cryptic words and a son's suspicious behaviour suggest either could be hiding a deadly grudge.

episodes.name: The Ivy League Murder
episodes.overview: A road rage incident unravels into a story of obsession and premeditation when Yale graduate student and former National Army Guardsman Kevin Jiang is gunned down in New Haven, Connecticut.

episodes.name: Explosive Secrets
episodes.overview: A famed real estate developer, Gary Triano, is murdered in his car by a remote-controlled pipe bomb; money, lies and revenge are the motivations, with evidence leading authorities on an international search to find the killers responsible.

episodes.name: Tangled Web
episodes.overview: A Mobile homeowner reports a theft of $9,000 to the police, and just thirty minutes later, a local father of three is mysteriously killed on their front porch.

episodes.name: Tangled Web
episodes.overview: A mobile homeowner reports a theft of $9,000; a father of three is killed on their front porch.

episodes.name: Deadly Mirage
episodes.overview: When Rob Limon is murdered at work, the investigation uncovers deep secrets about sex, friendship, religion and family; the broadcast explores the case featured in its chart-topping podcast "Deadly Mirage."

episodes.name: Kimberly Saenz
episodes.overview: Numerous patients at a Texas dialysis treatment centre have gone into cardiac arrest, resulting in five deaths in one month; investigators work with the Centers for Disease Control to expose a chilling connection between the unexplained tragedies.

episodes.name: Unraveling the Case Against Melissa Calusinski
episodes.overview: Was key evidence manipulated to help convict a day care worker of murder? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

episodes.name: A Little Patch of Perfect
episodes.overview: After Gary "Big Daddy" Farris mysteriously disappears, his family discovers his remains on their sprawling 10-acre estate. An investigation reveals a family deeply divided by jealousy and greed, but did one of them kill Big Daddy?

episodes.name: The Lies Beneath
episodes.overview: The discovery of a backyard burial leads police to a killer's arrest.

episodes.name: Deadly Spree
episodes.overview: The authorities investigate after a man is murdered after a game of pool in a crowded bar, and they realize surveillance video captured the crime on tape.

episodes.name: Deadly Spree
episodes.overview: When an attempted robbery ends in the murder of a retired sheriff's deputy, Gwinnett County detectives believe the suspects will strike again and race to track them down before more blood is shed.

episodes.name: Taylor Wardlaw
episodes.overview: A father of four vanishes days before Christmas; what authorities believe to be a bond violation, unfolds into something evil.

episodes.name: Deputy Spivey on Trial
episodes.overview: Former TV bailiff Renard Spivey found himself in a real-life courtroom drama when he was accused of killing his wife in 2019. He speaks out for the first time about the fight to prove his innocence in an interview with 48 Hours contributor Natalie Morales.

episodes.name: Seeking Justice
episodes.overview: Homicide detectives in Tulsa, Okla., look into the secret parts of a 65-year-old man's life after a welfare check reveals the man was killed and robbed.

episodes.name: Seeking Justice
episodes.overview: When a welfare check on a 65-year-old man reveals he's been brutally killed and robbed, Tulsa Homicide must delve into the secret parts of his life for answers.

episodes.name: Brenda Watson
episodes.overview: When a beloved grandfather is found shot dead in his Florida home, detectives fear his missing ex-wife is also in danger; as they uncover a tangled web of romance, infidelity and betrayal, new questions arise about her involvement in the murder.

episodes.name: The Blackout Murder of Livye Lewis
episodes.overview: A woman is discovered shot dead in her car with a blood-covered man alive on the ground. The man says he has no memory of how he got there. Investigators unravel the strange scene. 48 Hours correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

episodes.name: The Last Text
episodes.overview: A college teen vanishes while home on winter break. Will messages on his social media help his family's personal search?

episodes.name: Gun Runner/In a Flash
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a horrific killing in a family home leaves detectives clamoring for answers. But first, the Mobile shooting of a beloved father leads investigators on a city-wide manhunt to find the man who betrayed his friend.

episodes.name: Gun Runner and In a Flash
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a horrific killing in a family home leaves detectives clamoring for answers. But first, the Mobile shooting of a beloved father leads investigators on a city-wide manhunt to find the man who betrayed his friend.

episodes.name: Streets of Pain
episodes.overview: A visit to Mobile ends in tragedy when a violent chain reaction leads to the death of a teenage girl.

episodes.name: Streets of Pain
episodes.overview: A visit to Mobile ends in tragedy when a violent chain reaction leads to the death of a teenage girl.

episodes.name: Jennifer Blake
episodes.overview: A beloved grandmother is reported missing to Virginia police weeks before her body is found burned in the woods of another state. Authorities navigate family tensions to uncover the truth behind her brutal murder.

episodes.name: Kimberly Groh
episodes.overview: After an avid outdoorsman dies from an apparent suicide, South Carolina investigators must unravel a murky story of mental health struggles and a complicated marriage that led to his death.

episodes.name: The Search for JonBenét's Killer
episodes.overview: Is there new hope to solve the murder of JonBenét Ramsey? Her father says there's a way.

episodes.name: Margaret Frankie Kellis
episodes.overview: When an elderly woman finds her husband murdered in bed, police race to find the cold-blooded killer. Little do they know the murderer is a master manipulator hidden in plain sight.

episodes.name: The "Batman" Intruder
episodes.overview: Morgan Metzer is attacked in her home by a masked intruder disguising his voice to sound like Batman. Her ex-husband comes to her aid, but is he a hero? "48 Hours" contributor Nikki Battiste reports.

episodes.name: The Man of Many Faces
episodes.overview: Andrea Canning reports on the dramatic updates in the case of international fugitive Nicholas Rossi who faked his death as law enforcement closed in on him for alleged crimes of rape and fraud; will the man with multiple identities finally face justice?

episodes.name: Forever Young: Who Killed JonBenét Ramsey?
episodes.overview: JonBenét Ramsey's father speaks about what he thinks police can do right now to identify her killer. Can new technology solve this crime?

episodes.name: Jill Blackstone
episodes.overview: The sister of a successful Hollywood producer is found dead in the garage of a home they share. With conflicting clues at the scene, authorities are left to determine if the cause of death is a tragic accident, suicide or malicious plan.

episodes.name: The Firefighter's Secret
episodes.overview: A young woman is found dead in her burning home. She'd been involved with a firefighter — could he have set a fire to cover her murder? "48 Hours" contributor Nikki Battiste reports.

episodes.name: Camilla Frazier
episodes.overview: A family of rodeo queens is thrown into turmoil when their patriarch disappears from his Dalhart, Texas ranch. As investigators search for the missing father, they expose family secrets that will lead to a gruesome murder plot.

episodes.name: The Killer Among Them
episodes.overview: Millionaire entrepreneur Lance Herndon is found bludgeoned to death in his Atlanta home. The search for his killer reveals no shortage of suspects or secrets.

episodes.name: Meet the Other Me
episodes.overview: Officers race to find a kidnapped woman, not knowing that saving her would lead to the capture of a serial killer.

episodes.name: Tiesh Rhue
episodes.overview: A loving father and veteran suddenly vanishes in coastal South Carolina; as investigators question those close to him, they find the unraveling threads of a love triangle; when his body surfaces in a nearby river, a crime of passion comes to light.

episodes.name: The Plot to Eliminate Alyssa Burkett
episodes.overview: A toxic couple orchestrates an elaborate plan to kill a mother. Peter Van Sant reports.

episodes.name: Deadly Dance
episodes.overview: Dubbed the 'Black Swan' case, a former ballerina falls in love with a man 30 years her senior, but when their love story spirals out of control, one of them winds up dead.

episodes.name: Fatal Disguise
episodes.overview: It was one of the most notorious murders in the Atlanta area when a father was gunned down while dropping his young son off at preschool just days after a mysterious person was seen lurking outside his home with a gun.

episodes.name: Ezra McCandless
episodes.overview: A young woman seeks refuge at the home of a Wisconsin farmer, claiming she just escaped from a violent assault; when investigators arrive at the crime scene, they make a discovery that leads them to expose a deadly love triangle.

episodes.name: Tracking the Killer of Mary Catherine Edwards
episodes.overview: A schoolteacher is murdered in her own home. Years later investigators discover she was a bridesmaid at the killer's wedding. "48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

episodes.name: The Menendez Brothers: Chance at Freedom
episodes.overview: Latest developments and new interviews in the high-profile murder trial of Lyle and Erik Menendez; a scripted show reignites public interest in the case.

episodes.name: Fire & Vice
episodes.overview: A heart-pounding body-camera video captures moments after a firefighter is gunned down.

episodes.name: Danelle Geier
episodes.overview: When 55-year-old Ronald Bettig, a former Penn State professor, mysteriously goes missing, State College, PA police uncover clues to his untimely demise. The investigation leads to a grisly crime scene and two unlikely culprits, who would stop at nothing to get rid of him.

episodes.name: Fatal First Date
episodes.overview: A couple's first date ends with an ambush. Both are shot. Can the only survivor identify the shooter?

episodes.name: After the Halloween Party
episodes.overview: After a 2011 Halloween party at a country club in Dyersburg, Tennessee, Karen Swift, a wife and mother of four, vanishes. Nearly a decade later, a private investigator claims to uncover chilling new clues that turn the town upside down.

episodes.name: Her Last Halloween
episodes.overview: A woman goes missing the night of a Halloween party, and her car is found abandoned by the side of the road. The incredible story of Karen Swift, with exclusive interviews.

episodes.name: Kimberly Williams
episodes.overview: The tragic suicide of a beloved grandfather seems to be an open-and-shut case until detectives in Morrisdale, Pa., receive a message from beyond the grave that suggests the deceased may not have died by his own hand.

episodes.name: The Strange Shooting of Alex Pennig
episodes.overview: A nurse is found dead in her apartment. Surveillance video captures her coming home for the last time. Can investigators piece together what happened next? "48 Hours" contributor Natalie Morales reports.

episodes.name: Deadly Omission
episodes.overview: In Marietta, Georgia, a woman's murder shines a light on an unsolved mystery from years earlier. As the connection between the two cases becomes clear, a long-hidden truth surfaces. Could a master manipulator be behind both crimes? Andrea Canning reports.

episodes.name: A Puzzling Murder
episodes.overview: A flower delivery turns deadly, when a young woman is fatally shot at her front door.

episodes.name: Joyce Pelzer
episodes.overview: A Conyers, GA woman, Rosalyn 'Roz' Lewis, who is brutally stabbed 34 times, provides police with a suspect's name, her wife Joyce Pelzer, before succumbing to her injuries. As the manhunt for the killer begins, a pattern of toxicity will expose a violent past and more than one murder.

episodes.name: Who Killed Aileen Seiden in Room 15?
episodes.overview: Three people check into a Florida motel room. Only two walk out alive. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

episodes.name: The Night of the Nor'easter
episodes.overview: A monster storm had rolled into Canton, Massachusetts, and Karen Read's boyfriend, police officer John O'Keefe, was dead, his body discovered in front of another officer's house. Karen was charged with John's death. Was she to blame?

episodes.name: The Menendez Brothers: Reversal of Fortune?
episodes.overview: The episode delves into the details of the crime, the investigation, and the subsequent trials. It also explores the brothers' childhood, their relationship with their parents, and the factors that may have led them to commit such a heinous act.

episodes.name: Roberta Samard
episodes.overview: After Roberta Samard, a Millersburg, OR wife, claims she accidentally shot and killed her husband, Ken, while attempting to commit suicide in 2016, the cracks in a seemingly perfect marriage are brought to light. The investigation will uncover if his inadvertent death was truly an accident or a deadly cover-up.

episodes.name: Where is Jermain Charlo?
episodes.overview: Police have searched for 23-year-old mother Jermain Charlo since she vanished in June 2018 from Missoula, Montana. Now, six years after she disappeared, police release the last known images of the missing mom. Can this security camera video help reveal what happened to her?

episodes.name: Down the Rabbit Hole
episodes.overview: In Humble, Texas, a frantic 911 caller, 16-year-old Keri Murphy, reports hearing her mother's screams after an intruder entered their home. When first responders arrive, they find Mary Ann Murphy dead after receiving more than 70 stab wounds. What happened on that dark summer night?

episodes.name: Can I Prey First?
episodes.overview: When a young mother disappears, authorities dive for clues and answers in a muddy creek.

episodes.name: Cathleen Roth
episodes.overview: After a routine welfare check, Albuquerque police discover 61-year-old beloved schoolteacher Ellen Roth has vanished. As investigators dive into her family history, they uncover a shocking murder plot driven by vengeance and jealousy.

episodes.name: The Depraved Heart Murder
episodes.overview: Sarah Harris was a bright, young Maryland woman who dreamed of a career in medicine. On the morning of Jan. 26, 2022, she was found unresponsive on the floor of the home she shared with her boyfriend, Dr. James Ryan. Ryan told police it was an overdose, but Harris’ family believed he was responsible. Contributor Nikki Battiste reports.

episodes.name: Wrong Turns
episodes.overview: A new father is found dead on the side of a road. Then the stabbing of a young woman leads police on a high speed chase. Could these two chilling murders be connected? Josh Mankiewicz reports.

episodes.name: The Killer Down the Hall
episodes.overview: Jealousy leads to murder and detectives discover the killer was closer than they imagined

episodes.name: The Bathtub Murder of Kendy Howard
episodes.overview: Did a former Idaho state trooper use his law enforcement skills to stage his wife's death in their bathtub? "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

episodes.name: The Butterfly
episodes.overview: A young Fairfield, Ohio, woman, 21-year-old Katelyn Markham, vanishes one summer night in 2011, prompting her community to conduct a massive search. When her skeletal remains are found in Indiana two years later, investigators question her friends and family to uncover her killer, but it takes 12 years and a detective with dogged determination.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Looked Like Me
episodes.overview:
When a young nursing student disappears, her family, police and a woman with a prophetic vision launch an urgent search, but it's a set of keys that unlocks the answers.

The episode highlights the lack of media coverage given to missing cases involving Black women, a disparity that Tameka's story aimed to address.

episodes.name: Mary Lee Orsini
episodes.overview: When Alice McArthur, wife of high-profile criminal defense attorney Bill McArthur, is found shot dead in their Little Rock, AR home in 1982, police theorize if a disgruntled client of Bill's could be to blame. The investigation will expose an obsessive admirer with a delusional motive to murder.

episodes.name: The Life and Death of Blaze Bernstein
episodes.overview: A brilliant college student is killed by a former classmate. Inside the trial of the secret neo-Nazi prosecutors say murdered Blaze because he was gay and Jewish.

episodes.name: The Unending Search for Sara Anne Wood
episodes.overview: Investigators are locked in a 30-year game of cat and mouse with a child serial killer to find the body of 12-year-old Sara. "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

episodes.name: Cold Blooded
episodes.overview: A secret romance in a remote Alaskan town leads to murder. Police body camera footage reveals clues for a multi-state hunt for the killer.

episodes.name: Carole Gold
episodes.overview: When Charles 'Chuck' Gold, a Wild West reenactor, is found murdered in his private Arizona ranch by his wife Carole, Phoenix police race to find the killer of the beloved showman. As investigators connect the dots, they realize the cold-blooded mastermind is lurking close to home.

episodes.name: Felicia Barden
episodes.overview: When fireman Willie Barden, a devoted husband and father, is found shot to death on his bathroom floor in 2019, the case is quickly ruled a homicide. As a key witness starts changing their story, detectives in Olive Branch, MS, must determine if this was an act of self-defense or premeditated murder.

episodes.name: Tonica Jenkins
episodes.overview: Melissa Latham, a frantic East Cleveland, OH, woman, seeks refuge in a fast-food restaurant after escaping from a deadly assault. Police will sort through contradicting stories to expose a habitual criminal that will stop at nothing to avoid conviction.

episodes.name: Inside The Tape Special #16
episodes.overview:
Season Finale

A surveillance camera on a Minneapolis bus captures a shooting outside a church. The footage leaves detectives wondering if the shooter acted in self-defense.  Surveillance cameras at a Minneapolis convenience store capture more than just the shooting. Footage suggests vital DNA may have been left in the store by the shooter himself.  Then, surveillance footage in Atlanta shows a man carrying a box moments before he is shot. Detective Tracy Casey must determine if the box's contents holds the key to determining motive.  Additional Minneapolis surveillance cameras capture the shooting of a young man in the Cedar-Riverside neighborhood. But detectives need the help of the Somali community to identify the shooters in the video.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #16
episodes.overview: A surveillance camera on a Minneapolis bus captures a shooting outside a church. The footage leaves detectives wondering if the shooter acted in self-defense. Surveillance cameras at a Minneapolis convenience store capture more than just the shooting. Footage suggests vital DNA may have been left in the store by the shooter himself. Then, surveillance footage in Atlanta shows a man carrying a box moments before he is shot, Detective Tracy Casey must determine if the box's contents holds the key to determining motive. Additional Minneapolis surveillance cameras capture the shooting of a young man in the Cedar-Riverside neighborhood. But detectives need the help of the Somali community to identify the shooters in the video.

episodes.name: Debra Taylor
episodes.overview: When family man and National Guardsman Roy Taylor is shot to death in his home in 1988, his widow, Debra, is quick to point the blame around town. As Little Rock, AR, detectives tail the suspects, a torrid affair and deadly secret come to light, revealing a manipulative wolf in sheep's clothing.

episodes.name: Inside The Tape Special #15
episodes.overview: When a home invasion leaves a father-to-be shot dead, Detective Dianna Baumann's only hope for answers is a suspect fighting for his own life.  In Atlanta, two brothers are found shot dead in their home leaving Detective Scott DeMeester with little to go on, when his only potential suspect suddenly wants to talk.  When a man is shot dead inside a boarding home, Atlanta detectives try to drum up a lead from a roommate involved with the suspect.  The life of a 19-year-old woman hangs in the balance after walking in on an intruder in her home. When Tulsa detectives find the suspect, they realize it's not the first time they've stood face-to-face.

episodes.name: Inside the Tape Special #15
episodes.overview: When a home invasion leaves a father-to-be shot dead, Detective Dianna Baumann's only hope for answers is a suspect fighting for his own life. In Atlanta, two brothers are found shot dead in their home leaving Detective Scott DeMeester with little to go on, when his only potential suspect suddenly wants to talk. When a man is shot dead inside a boarding home, Atlanta detectives try to drum up a lead from a roommate involved with the suspect. The life of a 19-year-old woman hangs in the balance after walking in on an intruder in her home. When Tulsa detectives find the suspect, they realize it's not the first time they've stood face-to-face.

episodes.name: Viktoriya Nasyrova
episodes.overview: In this two-hour special, 35-year-old Olga Tsvyk, an immigrant pursuing her dreams, is found drugged in her home. Across New York, another person with similar symptoms comes forward, and authorities connect the cases, exposing an international fugitive with a ruthless pattern.

episodes.name: Sasha Skare
episodes.overview: The 2021 fatal shooting of a well-known San Antonio rapper, 34-year-old Air Force veteran Martell DeRouen aka Kardone, puts the community on high alert; as they piece together the evidence, witnesses point the finger at a scorned lover fueled by rage.

episodes.name: Barbara Pasa
episodes.overview: In May 2018, firefighters are called to the scene of a Centerville, IA, family's home to find the residence up in flames; as the smoke clears, they discover the charred remains of Tim Pasa and question whether the fire and his death were truly accidental.

episodes.name: Sydney Powell
episodes.overview: A beloved health care worker is viciously attacked in her home with only her daughter as a witness. Police must follow the disturbing clues at the scene to discover the truth behind this heinous attack that leaves a family shattered.

episodes.name: Olga Vasquez-Collazos
episodes.overview: A Peruvian healthcare worker gets a second chance at love until he’s found murdered in his Westminster, CA, apartment. Investigators set out to discover whether his new bride is a grieving widow or a femme fatale.

episodes.name: Death by Username
episodes.overview: Mobile homicide follows a trail of social media messages to track down the killers of a 17-year-old.

episodes.name: Death by Username
episodes.overview: Mobile homicide follows a trail of social media messages to track down the killers of a 17-year-old.

episodes.name: Kelsey Turner
episodes.overview: Beloved child psychiatrist Tom Burchard is found murdered and left in the trunk of a car in the Nevada desert. As the strange case unfolds, police discover he may have been the victim of a model aiming to maintain her lavish lifestyle.

episodes.name: Below The Surface
episodes.overview: After a 69-year-old woman is found dead in her bathtub, a suspect leads Tulsa detectives on a high-speed chase that ends tragically.

episodes.name: Below the Surface
episodes.overview: After a 69-year-old woman is found dead in her bathtub, a suspect leads Tulsa detectives on a high-speed chase that ends tragically.

episodes.name: Nicole Thornhill
episodes.overview: A Stuart, FL, woman’s desperate search for her missing husband takes a dark turn when his mutilated body is found in a landfill. As detectives dig into his home life, the victim’s family becomes a crucial link to uncovering the grisly truth.

episodes.name: Bad Business
episodes.overview: When a young father from Atlanta is shot dead on a Mobile street, detectives discover that his talent for computers may have gotten him in over his head.

episodes.name: Bad Business
episodes.overview: When a young father from Atlanta is shot dead on a Mobile street, detectives discover that his talent for computers may have gotten him in over his head.

episodes.name: Hunted on the Highway
episodes.overview: In Mobile, two men are killed after their car is sprayed with bullets on the highway, leading detectives across the country in search of answers.

episodes.name: Hunted on the Highway
episodes.overview: In Mobile, two men are killed after their car is sprayed with bullets on the highway, Ieading detectives across the country in search of answers.

episodes.name: Sudden Impact
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a late-night meeting spins out of control, leaving a young father dead, his friend critically injured, and their SUV crashed through a child's bedroom.

episodes.name: Sudden Impact
episodes.overview: In Tulsa, a late-night meeting spins out of control, leaving a young father dead, his friend critically injured, and their SUV crashed through a child's bedroom.

episodes.name: Complex Terror
episodes.overview: A deadly home invasion sparks a manhunt for a stranger terrorizing a Tulsa housing complex.

episodes.name: Complex Terror
episodes.overview: A deadly home invasion sparks a manhunt for a stranger terrorizing a Tulsa housing complex.

episodes.name: Murder at The Uptown
episodes.overview: In a crowded Tulsa bar, surveillance video captures the owner being gunned down as he tries to break up a fight between two dancers.

episodes.name: Murder at The Uptown
episodes.overview: In a crowded Tulsa bar, surveillance video captures the owner being gunned down as he tries to break up a fight between two dancers.
